# SDU Lab Report

A **unofficial** SDU common lab report.

## Quick Start

```typ
#import "@preview/unofficial-sdu-lab-report:0.1.1": *

#show: report.with(
    partner: "QM",
    student-name: "Arshtyi",
    student-grade: "1",
    student-group: "1",
    course: "YuGiOh!",
    lab-title: "Pendulum Summon",
    lab-date: datetime.today(),
    tool-group: "1",
    logo: image("sdu.png"),
)
```

or

```bash
typst init @preview/unofficial-sdu-lab-report:0.1.1
```
